Message:
I’ve been at the bottom
of the lake ever since,
teetering between life and death.

After a while,
there was no point looking up
at the surface anymore.

There’s no way anyone
would ever think of
saving a cursed witch,

No one wants to save...
someone like me...

just like the footsteps
were in the hallway...

I covered my ears,
trying so hard to
avert my eyes,

but the sound...
stopped right in front of me.
